brand_info.mission: Offer contemporary fashion and design at attractive prices, informed by continuous customer feedback and rapid design execution. citeturn3search7turn3search2

brand_values.brand_promise: Newness and relevance delivered quickly, with an editorial fashion sensibility at accessible price points.
differentiators: Sub-lines that test premium or functional narratives (e.g., SRPLS, Origins)

demographics.income_level: Mass market to upper mass (accessible fashion)

psychographics.lifestyle: Urban, trend-aware, digitally fluent customers seeking frequent wardrobe refreshes and contemporary styling.
psychographics.behavior: High visit frequency, impulse-friendly purchase patterns, mix-and-match basics with directional pieces, strong mobile and in-store omnichannel usage.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Minimal, declarative, and category-led; communicates through image hierarchy more than copy.
tone_of_voice.language_register: Neutral, international English; short functional statements.
preferred_structures: Editorial fragments tied to a line or capsule

logo.primary_logo: ZARA wordmark in a high-contrast serif logotype, typically black on white.
logo.usage_rules: Keep the wordmark clean, flat, and high contrast; prioritize legibility; never distort, outline, texture-fill, or apply effects.
logo.lockup_behavior: Centered or top-aligned in editorial layouts with generous clear space; used as a signature rather than a graphic element.
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals at least the height of the letter 'Z' around the wordmark.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Default to monochrome brand framing; allow image-led color; avoid branded gradients; keep UI elements neutral.

typography.primary_font: High-contrast serif for brand signature; modern grotesk sans-serif for UI and functional text.
typography.secondary_font: Neutral sans-serif for product data and navigation.

spacing.letter_spacing: Tight for wordmark, normal for UI

layout_principles.grid_system: Modular editorial grid with strong alignment; e-commerce grids optimized for rapid scanning.
layout_principles.white_space_ratio: High, with intentional negative space in campaign contexts.
layout_principles.image_vs_text_balance: Image-led with restrained text; product pages prioritize imagery first, then details.
layout_principles.cta_placement: Discrete, utility-driven (lower area or sidebar in digital).
layout_principles.alignment: Centered or clean edge-aligned; avoids decorative asymmetry.

style.camera_feel: Fashion magazine campaign language: decisive framing, strong subject presence, minimal set distraction.
style.pose_guidelines: Controlled and intentional; confident stillness; limited gestural exaggeration; occasional dynamic walking or turn for line movement.
style.casting_attitude: Contemporary, diverse, model-forward casting with a composed, self-possessed gaze.

technical.lighting: Clean studio light or controlled daylight; sculpted but not cinematic-noir.
technical.contrast: Medium to high, with crisp tonal separation.
technical.grain: Very subtle to none; when present, fine film-like texture.
technical.depth_of_field: Moderate; sharp subject priority with clean background falloff.
technical.color_grading: Neutral to cool; restrained saturation; frequent monochrome or near-monochrome edits.

model_casting.diversity: High, international, with a casting-first aesthetic strategy.
model_casting.attitude: Composed confidence; direct gaze; emotionally cool, editorial presence.

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Garment silhouette and styling readability prioritized; product is the narrative vehicle.
product_presentation.styling_approach: Directional basics and strong outerwear; tonal layering; occasional statement proportion; accessories minimal unless capsule-specific.
avoid: Over-branded patterns as the only hook

motion_rules.pacing: Short, editorial clips; minimal camera movement; emphasis on pose shifts and garment movement.
motion_rules.transitions: Hard cuts or clean fades; avoids playful motion graphics.

visual_dos: Use decisive casting and clean backgrounds
visual_donts: Over-saturated palettes as a brand layer
copy_dos: Use collection names and concise descriptors

can_evolve: Use of AI-assisted imagery under consent frameworks

materials: White walls with black typographic wayfinding
interactive_elements: Large digital screens with campaign loops

digital.tone_adjustment: Ultra-functional UI with editorial campaign moments; minimal copy and strong grid discipline.

platform_behavior.Instagram: Campaign-first image sequences, sparse captions, strong casting. citeturn2search11
platform_behavior.Website: Grid-led navigation, large imagery, minimal UI chrome.
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Short subject lines, hero image, minimal text.

print.paper: Coated or matte premium stock depending on market; minimalist layouts.
print.cover_rules: Full-bleed or high-negative-space layouts with the ZARA wordmark as a quiet signature.

logo_misuse_examples: Applying shadows, outlines, gradients, or textures to the wordmark
